intro: Spilacron, commonly known as the spilacron plant, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its small, daisy-like flowers that typically bloom in shades of yellow and white. The plant has narrow, linear leaves that are arranged alternately along the stem. It is native to certain regions of southern Africa and thrives in well-drained soils. Spilacron is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
